com.gej.util

Class ImageTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gej.util.ImageTool

  • public class ImageTool
extends java.lang.Object
    This class can be used to convert images. Note that all the methods of this class are declared as static.
    Author:
    Sri Harsha Chilakapati
